solution_line_template: Mary has {num_bedrooms} + {num_kitchens} + {num_living_rooms} = <<{num_bedrooms}+{num_kitchens}+{num_living_rooms}={total_rooms}>>{total_rooms} rooms in her house.

At {minutes_per_room} minutes a room, it will take her {minutes_per_room} * {total_rooms} = <<{minutes_per_room}*{total_rooms}={total_vacuuming_time}>>{total_vacuuming_time} minutes to vacuum her whole house.

At {charge_duration_minutes} minutes a charge, she will need to charge her vacuum cleaner {total_vacuuming_time} / {charge_duration_minutes} = <<{total_vacuuming_time}/{charge_duration_minutes}={num_charges_needed}>>{num_charges_needed} times to vacuum her whole house.
